Cheltenham Festival Day 2 - Champion Bumper Odds

The Champion Bumper is the most unique race of the entire Cheltenham Festival in the fact that there are no obstacles for the horses to jump, it is run under National Hunt rules for the juvenile horses and often gives us the chance to see the stars of the future. The Champion Bumper itself has not been around for too long but already it is one of the highlights of the meeting as the final race on the day 2 card of the Festival.

In recent years we have had some fantastic winners of the Champion Bumper with the likes of Cousin Vinny and Dunguib starting off their careers with a huge victory at the Festival, while Champagne Fever is another top class recent winner.
